systemChanges.reason: Vision analyzer was giving false 100% scores, missing data completeness issues, and costing money on API calls
systemChanges.replacement: Playwright MCP Agent now handles all quality verification
benefits: Zero API costs for quality checks
100% accuracy - agent reads actual DOM elements

systemChanges.reason: Removed 5-attempt retry loop - agent will handle regeneration requests
systemChanges.impact: Faster generation (no retry delays), cleaner code, agent-driven quality control

common_errors.solution: RESOLVED: Vision analyzer removed. Agent now verifies data completeness via Playwright MCP

common_errors.error: Vision analyzer false positives

common_errors.solution: RESOLVED: Vision analyzer completely removed. Playwright MCP Agent handles all quality checks

bestPractices: Temperature 0.2 works well for text consistency

rules_learned: NEVER trust 100% score from vision analyzer without manual verification
ALWAYS check that ALL required data fields are present, not just some
ALWAYS verify economic factors count: should be 3, not 1

prompt_improvements.improvement: Added quotation mark reminder after 2 authentication errors
